long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our Color Picker and Palette Generator helps you create your own brand book effortlessly by extracting colors from ANY webpage on your browser.

Gone are the days of painstakingly searching for color codes or manually creating color palettes. 

Seamlessly integrated into your browsing experience, this extension provides a hassle-free solution for capturing and organizing colors that catch your eye.

Here's how you can do it : 

1- Open the extension
2- Select any color from a page with our color picker
3- Click on "Generate Palette" 
4- Instantly copy the 4 generated colors to any destination

In addition to its remarkable functionality, our Color Picker and Palette Generator extension boasts a sleek and user-friendly interface. 

Its intuitive design ensures that both novice and experienced users can navigate and utilize its features with ease, empowering you to bring your creative vision to life.
